title: Organization Formation Schema
description: Information about when, how, and why an organization was created, establishing its historical context and original purpose.

founding_date.description: When this organization was first established within the narrative timeline. This could be a specific date or a general era.

character_id.description: Reference to a character who played a significant role in founding this organization.

role.description: The specific contribution or position this founder held during the organization's creation.

founders.description: Key individuals responsible for establishing this organization.

founding_purpose.description: The original mission or reason for this organization's creation, which may differ from its current purpose as the organization evolved over time.

founding_location_id.description: Reference to the place where this organization was first established.
